<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby's blog starter with Bootstrap
</h1>

*UI is not designed as this is meant to be a bare minimum. You therefore have to implement your own design*

By oluwakeyejohn

## Featured

* Removed typography
* Added bootstrap, popper.js and jquery

## Usage

* clone this repo
* Run the code below
 ```shell script
    npm install
    npm start
```
